sections.heading: to 42-1-39 - Repealed.Section 42-1-40 - Recompiled.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1981, ch. 125, § 62, repealed 42-1-1 to 42-1-39 NMSA 1978, relating to eminent domain, effective July 1, 1981. For present provisions,see42A-1-1 through 42A-1-33 NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilations.— Laws 1981, ch. 125, § 60, recompiled 42-1-40 NMSA 1978, relating to statutes of limitations for actions against state agencies or political subdivisions, as 42A-1-31 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 1981.
